mention.text: the release of former captain alvaro sanabria , who is implicated in the assassination of msgr oscar arnulfo romero , because of contradictory statements by a key witness
the release of the former captain
the decision issued by justice romeo aurora acquitting and ordering the release of the former captain
a report on his ruling , which according to the law can be either revoked or confirmed by the constitutional court
this document issued by judge aurora
